Subjects: Flodden Field, battle of; historical poems; Scotland, Flodden, lament on
_description: Lament on the misfortunes following Flodden — six stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd45102.First Lines:
O Schotland thow was flowryng in prosperus weltheI regent rewlyng
                    the ad my wyll…
BLAdd45102.Last Lines:
…ffrom ther pur prayrrs yff it be goddis wylOff hys inffinitte
                    mersy not hys…
BLAdd45102.Note:
Some damage to text means that text is partially
                    indecipherable,
